name: The Revenge of Johnny Bonasera: Episode 3
description: Hilarious adventure game in cartoon style.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
